title: Subpart 9-4 - REAL ESTATE INVESTMENT TRUSTS (REITS) AND REGULATED INVESTMENT COMPANIES (RICS)
content:
Subpart 9-4 - REAL ESTATE INVESTMENT TRUSTS (REITS) AND REGULATED INVESTMENT COMPANIES (RICS)

State Regulations
§ 9-4.1 - General treatment of REITs and RICs
§ 9-4.2 - Computation of income
§ 9-4.3 - Qualified financial instrument apportionment rules for non-captive REITs and non-captive RICs
§ 9-4.4 - Combination rules for REITs and RICs

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
